name: Manchu Wok
address: University Community Centre, 1151 Richmond Street, London

menu_items.name: Spring Rolls
menu_items.description: Crispy rolls filled with cabbage, carrots, and glass noodles. Served with a sweet chili dipping sauce.

menu_items.name: Chicken Satay Skewers
menu_items.description: Grilled chicken skewers marinated in a blend of spices, served with a peanut sauce.

menu_items.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
menu_items.description: Stir-fried rice with mixed vegetables, soy sauce, and sesame oil.

menu_items.name: Beef and Broccoli
menu_items.description: Tender beef slices stir-fried with broccoli in a savory oyster sauce.

menu_items.name: Tofu and Vegetable Stir-fry
menu_items.description: Tofu cubes stir-fried with bell peppers, broccoli, and carrots in a garlic soy sauce.

menu_items.name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
menu_items.description: Crispy chicken pieces tossed in a tangy sweet and sour sauce with pineapple and bell peppers.

menu_items.name: Mango Sticky Rice
menu_items.description: Sweet sticky rice served with ripe mango slices and a coconut milk drizzle.

menu_items.name: Coconut Milk Bubble Tea
menu_items.description: Iced tea with coconut milk and tapioca pearls.

menu_items.name: Almond Cookies
menu_items.description: Crispy cookies made with almond flour and sliced almonds.

menu_items.name: Jasmine Green Tea
menu_items.description: Fragrant jasmine-infused green tea served hot or iced.

menu_items.name: Noodle Bar Wednesday
menu_items.description: A selection of noodles and toppings available every Wednesday.

menu_items.name: Build-A-Bowl Thursday
menu_items.description: Customizable bowls with various ingredients available every Thursday.

menu_items.name: Fish & Chip Friday
menu_items.description: Traditional fish and chips available every Friday.

menu_items.name: Buffet
menu_items.description: Buffet with daily beverage and dessert features.
